"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": "Employee Details"}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "emp_id", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Employee ID"}, {"fieldname": "employee_name", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Employee Name"}, {"fieldname": "dept", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Department"}, {"fieldname": "job_title", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Designation"}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "resident_id_number", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Resident ID Number(QID)"}, {"fieldname": "date_of_join", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Date of Joining"}, {"fieldname": "company", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Company / Division"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": ""}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "html_17", "print_hide": 0}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": "Request Details"}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "dated", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Date"}, {"fieldname": "check_15", "print_hide": 0, "label": "I agree with these terms and I shall co-operate"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": "For Office Use"}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "accommodation_eligibility", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Accommodation Eligibility"}, {"fieldname": "data_10", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Accommodation Detials"}, {"fieldname": "hr", "print_hide": 0, "label": "HR & Admin Assistant"}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "hr_admin", "print_hide": 0, "label": "HR & Admin Manager"}, {"fieldname": "managing_director", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Managing Director"}]
html:
Date:{{frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.dec_date)}}


{{doc.name}}

Employee Vacating Accommodation Declaration

EMPLOYEE DETAILS

Employee ID {{doc.emp_id or ''}} Employee Name {{doc.employee_name or ''}}
Resident ID Number(QID) {{doc.resident_id_number or ''}} Date of Joining {{frappe.utils.format_date (doc.date_of_join or '')}}
Department {{doc.dept or ''}} Designation {{doc.job_title or ''}}

Self Declaration

I hereby understand that I am vacating my company provided accommodation for a shorter duration due to my personal reasons and I am eligible for a leave out allowance as per the company policy.If I wish to re-possess in the company provided accommodation at the later date , the company shall be verify the availability of bed space and process my request . If there is no accommodation/bed space available during the time the company shall continue to provide me with leave out allowance as per the company policy

Employee Signature


For Office Use

Accommodation Eligibility
Accommodation Detials{{doc.data_10 or ''}}
HR & Admin Assistant{{doc.hr or ''}}
HR & Admin Manager{{doc.hr_admin or ''}}
Managing Director{{doc.managing_director or ''}}
name: Employee Vacating Accommodation Declaration
